title: US election: Appeal court dismisses Trump camp's lawsuit in Pennsylvania
description: The three judges said no specific allegations or proof of election fraud were given by Trump's team.

title: Covid: Has England's lockdown worked?
description: England is moving out of national restrictions into a tougher tier system than before. But why?

title: Covid tiers: 'Rules have changed in the middle of the game'
description: Businesses and families are coming to terms with England's new tier system, in place from 2 December.

title: Getting 'crushed' on Melbourne's path to coronavirus success
description: By one measure the city has just eliminated the virus, but relieved locals also fear a hidden cost.

title: World Cup referee 'proud' to help Maradona score against England in 1986 quarter-final
description: The Tunisian referee from England's infamous defeat by Argentina at the 1986 World Cup says he is "proud and honoured" to have helped Diego Maradona score the 'goal of the century'.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'monochrome'
description: A selection of pictures from our readers on the theme of "monochrome".

title: Topshop owner Arcadia on brink of collapse

title: Adrian Ismay murder: Christopher Robinson is jailed for 22 years
description: Christopher Robinson is sentenced to a minimum of 22 years for the murder Adrian Ismay in 2016.

title: Coronavirus restrictions: Why is so much of the North and Midlands in tier 3?
description: Over three-quarters of people in northern England and the Midlands are facing the toughest restrictions.

title: Taiwan lawmakers throw pig guts and punches
description: Taiwan's opposition legislators exchanged blows in a heated row over the easing of US pork imports.

title: Utah monolith: Internet sleuths got there, but its origins are still a mystery
description: The metal monolith sits deep in a desert easy to get lost in, so officials did not reveal its location.

description: Team news and preview as Wigan play reigning champions St Helens in Friday's Super League Grand Final (20:00 BST).

title: England among top European seeds for 2022 World Cup qualifying
description: England secure one of the top 10 European seeds in the draw for World Cup 2022 qualifying after staying fourth in Fifa's world rankings.

description: The president has refused to admit defeat but says he will go if Joe Biden's victory is confirmed.

title: Oxford/AstraZeneca Covid vaccine 'dose error' explained

description: Most papers lead on reaction to areas being placed within the government's tougher new tier system.

description: A pub that survived World War Two and the North Sea flood of 1953 now takes on Covid-19.
